#include <iostream>
#include <vector>
#include <algorithm>
#include <limits.h>
#include <cstdio>
#include <math.h>
#include <cstdlib>
#include <map>
#include <cstring>
#define ll long long int
 
using namespace std;
 
int main()
{
    ll test, n;
    cin >> test;
    cin >> n;
    while(test--) {
        ll  i, j, k = 1;
        cin >> i >> j;
        while(j--) {
            k = (k*i)%n;
        }
        cout << k % n << endl;
    }
 
 
    return 0;
}
